attributes.action: Do not implement another lockdown this Christmas
attributes.additional_details:
Do not implement another lockdown this Christmas

 

I want the Government to commit to not implementing another lockdown this Christmas. There should be no restrictions on social gatherings or household restrictions.
attributes.background:

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602920
